argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspsn.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspsn.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | lspsn.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lspsn.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 5 |  | lspsn.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> X e. V ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_snssd | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> { X } C_ V ) |
| 10 | 3, 6, 5 | #P_lspcl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ { X } C_ V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 9, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> R e. K ) |
| 13 | 3, 4, 1, 2, 5, 7, 12, 8 | #P_lspsneli | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( R .x. X ) e. ( N ` { X } ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 5, 7, 11, 13 | #P_lspsnel5a | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ R e. K /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { ( R .x. X ) } ) C_ ( N ` { X } ) ) |
